name: 霍弘毅
objective: In the first half of the semester, students will review the basic rules for and mechanics of formal Word documents including Basic English Writing skills from sentences to paragraphs. In the second half of the semester, students have to put the skills to work to create a small but coherent essay with a Works Cited page.
scorePolicy:
Mid-Term 40%: Basic English Sentences with Style techniques and short coherent paragraphs.
　　　　Final 60%: Short Essay. 5 Paragraphs plus Works Cited. MLA Style.
materials: Dr Wall’s Guides to Grammar, Style, and Paragraphs. MLA Guides. Handouts. Available on NTUT Portal.
